title: Cane Creek eeSilk Carbon & light alloy suspension seatposts smooth your ride
content:
Cane Creek has updated their short travel eeSilk suspension seatposts to improve performance and durability, adding a new carbon shaft version and dropping the alloy post’s price. You still get 20mm of travel adjustable for rider weight to smooth out rough asphalt, dirt & gravel roads… Cane Creek eeSilk Carbon & alloy 20mm suspension seatposts […]

The post Cane Creek eeSilk Carbon & light alloy suspension seatposts smooth your ride appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
